title: @RiotRepertoir Please consider this minor Ashe change
body:
Add a freeze effect as well as a clear AoE slow indicator to her ultimate. This would make her more consistent (Lore-wise) with the other Freljord Queens ultimates (both of them trap the target(s) in ice) and improve clarity on one of the strongest ultimates in the game, not to mention how cool it would look. Don't forget how Ashe freezes Warwick with her ultimate in the first LoL cinematic :p

I know that a VFX change requires some time, but I think that with her rework moving to PBE soon it's worth going for it. 

[I created another discussion some days ago concerning this change and it actually went quite popular. Feel free to check it out.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/gf34uOp6-since-ashes-rework-is-near)

replies.body:
Hi Avious,

Adding some better effects to Ashe's outdated stuff would indeed be cool, but unfortunately, it's not going to be possible for this update. Ashe actually wasn't really a planned project at all, but when a small amount of Champion Update bandwidth presented itself, we hopped on the opportunity to provide a short and sweet touch-up on Ashe. Unfortunately, as I mentioned, the amount of bandwidth was indeed very small, so we won't be able to do a full suite of new effects.
That is sad to know... Does this mean there won't be any improvements to her visuals anytime soon? Not even like what happened with Kassadin's or Morgana's ability effects updates?
Those that mean it's still possible if you guys get the chance in the future?
I think I speak for many when I say that I'm glad you and ChampUp were able to squeeze her in :), hoping for improved effects in a future update!
Ashe's ult is far from the best ult in the game.
It's definitely not the best. You can't deny it is a very strong and versatile ability, though.
I'd like to see feedback on her E. It seems like a one point wonder that you will never want to put more points in ever...

Her E was never really worth maxing. When the gold on kill was scaling from 1 to 5 it was a way to make easy money, but it still made you significantly weaker in lane. Nothing new here. Would like to know about your thoughts on my suggestion tho.
